definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

sentences.english: Shackle Undead now costs 9% of base mana.
sentences.chinese: 束缚亡灵现在消耗9%的基础法力值。

sentences.english: I admire the Mexican rite called Day of the Dead.
sentences.chinese: 我欣羡墨西哥的一个叫做亡灵节的仪式。

sentences.english: She stabs the undead and the teams get to fighting.
sentences.chinese: 她插了那亡灵一刀，然后两队陷入了群殴。

sentences.english: The chest is no longer safe. Chart a course to Isla Cruces .
sentences.chinese: 亡灵箱已经不再安全了，向克鲁斯岛出发。

sentences.english: The plot is human, or the undead grudge?
sentences.chinese: 是人为的阴谋，还是亡灵的咒怨？

sentences.english: After getting away from pursuing troops, I fast rush via into Wu to go properly main cool Lun location.
sentences.chinese: 摆脱追兵后，我迅速的赶往亡灵法师酷伦处。

sentences.english: And I grudge the alive being that the Wu works properly a clan, also complicated see.
sentences.chinese: 而且我讨厌亡灵族的生物，太难看了。

sentences.english: Return to Mehlar at the Bulwark when you have done this.
sentences.chinese: 当完成这些的时候回到亡灵壁垒的梅拉那里。

sentences.english: Cover of Darkness blankets all under the reign of the Necromancers .
sentences.chinese: 黑暗的幕布遮盖了亡灵法师统治的地区。

sentences.english: The neoconservative policy response to an undead uprising would be simple and direct.
sentences.chinese: 新保守主义对亡灵造反的政策回应是简单而直接的。

sentences.english: Raise Archers Allows a Necromancer to raise Skeleton Archers instead of Skeletons.
sentences.chinese: 箭手招魂亡灵巫师能够召唤出骷髅射手代替骷髅。

sentences.english: Cover of Darkness blankets all under the reign of the Necromancers.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗的幕布遮盖了亡灵法师统治的地区。

sentences.english: What is the aspect of Asha worshipped by the Necromancers?
sentences.chinese: 亡灵族所崇拜的秩序之龙的象征是什么？

sentences.english: The death knight combines martial prowess with dark, necromantic energies.
sentences.chinese: 死亡骑士把武力和黑暗的亡灵法术结合在一起。

sentences.english: The legendary Urn of Whispering Warriors. Said to contain souls of the entire Tenshu army.
sentences.chinese: 呢喃武士们的灵坛，据说装着整个天蜀大军的亡灵。

sentences.english: Do you think it has something to do with what you said about the veil to the underworld possibly being torn?
sentences.chinese: 莫非你认为它和有可能被扯破的亡灵界的结界有关吗？

definition: spirit of a martyr/spirit of the brave departed/person of remarkable talent
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
